error.name: CKMC_ERROR_SOCKET
error.msg: Socket error between client and Central Key Manager

error.name: CKMC_ERROR_BAD_RESPONSE
error.msg: Invalid response from Central Key Manager

error.name: CKMC_ERROR_AUTHENTICATION_FAILED
error.msg: Optional password which used when saving is incorrect

error.name: CKMC_ERROR_BUFFER_TOO_SMALL
error.msg: The output buffer size which is passed as parameter is too small

error.name: CKMC_ERROR_SERVER_ERROR
error.msg: Central Key Manager has been failed for some reason

error.name: CKMC_ERROR_DB_LOCKED
error.msg: The database was not unlocked - user did not login

error.name: CKMC_ERROR_DB_ERROR
error.msg: An internal error inside the database

error.name: CKMC_ERROR_DB_ALIAS_EXISTS
error.msg: Provided alias already exists in the database

error.name: CKMC_ERROR_VERIFICATION_FAILED
error.msg: CA certificate(s) were unknown and chain could not be created

error.name: CKMC_ERROR_INVALID_FORMAT
error.msg: A provided file or binary has not a valid format

error.name: CKMC_ERROR_FILE_ACCESS_DENIED
error.msg: A provided file doesn't exist or cannot be accessed in the file system

error.name: CKMC_ERROR_NOT_EXPORTABLE
error.msg: The data is saved as unexportable so it cannot be leaked

error.name: CKMC_ERROR_FILE_SYSTEM
error.msg: Save key/certificate/pkcs12 failed because of file system error
